name: Cosmic Mugs: Art that Lets You Taste the Universe Everyday
blurb: Cosmic Mugs are a series of handmade pottery mugs with abstract glazes inspired by images from NASA's Hubble Space Telescope.

name: AA Clay Studio For The People
blurb: We are fundraising to purchase four (4) pottery wheels. A vital addition to our shared clay studio space made to benefit the community.

name: The Neolithic Inspired Studio!
blurb: Pledge my campaign and get handmade ceramic arts and crafts! From functional pottery, to ceramic sculpture, to custom clay commissions!

name: Help ArtShack Brooklyn Expand Our Ceramics Studio
blurb: ArtShack Brooklyn, a nonprofit ceramics studio, is expanding so that we can better serve our growing community.

name: Bklyn Clay: Give Us Gas!
blurb: A new community art space opening this September featuring a gas kiln, 24/7 member access, and classes for every age and skill level.

name: Cardboard Ceramics
blurb: Turning disposable cardboard coffee cup sleeves into beautiful reusable tableware. Help me produce a batch of of these cups!

name: 'The Big Sea Serpent' Ceramic Cocktail Vessel / Tiki Mug Set
blurb: Tiki-mug evoking a Sea Serpent, segmented lidded ceramic vessel set by renowned sculptor 'Crazy Al' Evans with Limited Edition glazes!!

name: Yauali
blurb: Innovative ceramic "Pot-Lamp" design with integrated LED and a removable container for small plants! Enjoy nature and light everywhere!

name: Vibe Bottle - Kickstarter ver 2.0
blurb: Vibe Bottle, art you can drink from! Refillable glass bottles with a unique 1 time break replacement warranty. Dishwasher safe.

name: Worst Pen Ever!
blurb: You are definitely not going to want this!

name: Arundel Studios' new Nanaimo community pottery studio
blurb: I am expanding my production studio in Nanaimo BC to include a pottery studio where classes, workshops and drop-in times are available.

name: Handmade Christmas Ornaments
